author: jsamudio
body:
This adds functionality to the `LHEPtFilter` to use a scalar sum instead of the vector sum, although the default functionality is preserved. The purpose for this addition is motivated by a need to filter POWHEG ttbb 4f samples during generation in a way that works uniformly across every decay channel.

#### PR validation:

Validated with the addition of the filter to a McM test script from `TOP-RunIII2024Summer24wmLHEGS` and modified for `14_1_X`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of #48250 + it's later fixes. This is targeting `14_1_X` as requested by @stahlleiton
title: [14_1_X] Add scalar sum to LHEPtFilter
